com.interpss.core.sparse.impl

Class AbstractSparseEquation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.interpss.core.sparse.impl.AbstractSparseEquation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISparseEquation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SparseEqnComplexImpl, SparseEqnComplexMatrix3x3Impl, SparseEqnDoubleImpl, SparseEqnIntegerImpl

    public abstract class AbstractSparseEquation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISparseEquation
    Base Sparse Equation for solving sparse matrix problems.
